name: eslint-plugin-jsapps
description: Custom ESLint rules for javascript applications.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test --coverage && npm run check-coverage
scripts.unit-test: istanbul test --dir build/coverage node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/**/*.js -- --recursive --reporter dot
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/**/*.js -- --report lcovonly --recursive --reporter spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Ueli Kunz <kunz@ideadapt.net>
